A

ASSURANCE_CDCVM_UNKNOWN - Static variable in interface org.globalplatform.broker.CDCVMBrokerListener
 

B

BrokerCallbackRequest - Interface in org.globalplatform.broker
Interface implemented by a Broker Application allowing other Applications to request an immediate action from the Broker Application.
BrokerListener - Interface in org.globalplatform.broker
Interface implemented by an Application to listen to the events notified by a Broker Application.
BrokerRequestHandler - Interface in org.globalplatform.broker
Interface implemented by an Application to handle the requests submitted by a Broker Application.

CDCVMBrokerCallbackRequest - Interface in org.globalplatform.broker
Extension of the BrokerCallbackRequest interface including definitions specific to the CDCVM (Consumer Device CVM) use case.

Extension of the BrokerListener interface including definitions specific to the CDCVM (Consumer Device CVM) use case.
CDCVMBrokerRequestHandler - Interface in org.globalplatform.broker
Extension of the BrokerRequestHandler interface including definitions specific to the CDCVM (Consumer Device CVM) use case.

onBrokerEvent(short, short, short, short, short, short, short, short, short) - Method in interface org.globalplatform.broker.BrokerListener
Notifies a Broker Event.
org.globalplatform.broker - package org.globalplatform.broker
Defines interfaces enabling interactions between a Broker Application and other Applications, within smart cards based on GlobalPlatform specifications.

R

REQUEST_CDCVM_FRESH_VERIFICATION_RESULT - Static variable in interface org.globalplatform.broker.CDCVMBrokerCallbackRequest
Constant used to request the Broker Application notifying a fresh CDCVM verification result (of specified CDCVM object) that hasn't been notified yet to the caller Application.
REQUEST_CDCVM_LAST_EVENT - Static variable in interface org.globalplatform.broker.CDCVMBrokerCallbackRequest
Constant used to request the Broker Application sending back the last CDCVM event (pertaining to specified CDCVM object).
REQUEST_CDCVM_NEW_VERIFICATION - Static variable in interface org.globalplatform.broker.CDCVMBrokerCallbackRequest
Constant used to request the Broker Application initiating a procedure to have the Host Device (or a Host Device Application) trigger a new CDCVM verification attempt (of specified CDCVM object) and produce a new verification result.
REQUEST_CDCVM_NOTIFY_VERIFICATION_CONSUMED - Static variable in interface org.globalplatform.broker.CDCVMBrokerCallbackRequest
Constant used to notify the Broker Application that the caller Application has consumed the last notified successful verification result (pertaining to specified CDCVM object).
REQUEST_CDCVM_VERIFY - Static variable in interface org.globalplatform.broker.CDCVMBrokerRequestHandler
Request to verify a CDCVM value.
requestCallback(short, short, short) - Method in interface org.globalplatform.broker.BrokerCallbackRequest

SECURITY_CDCVM_C2V_NOT_APPLICABLE - Static variable in interface org.globalplatform.broker.CDCVMBrokerListener
Transmission of CDCVM data from capture to verifier does not require security (e.g.
SECURITY_CDCVM_C2V_SC - Static variable in interface org.globalplatform.broker.CDCVMBrokerListener
Transmission of CDCVM data from capture to verifier uses a secure channel.
SECURITY_CDCVM_C2V_UNKNOWN - Static variable in interface org.globalplatform.broker.CDCVMBrokerListener
Transmission of CDCVM data from capture to verifier uses unknown security mechanisms (possibly none).
SECURITY_CDCVM_C2V_XIO_NO_SC - Static variable in interface org.globalplatform.broker.CDCVMBrokerListener
Transmission of CDCVM data from capture to verifier uses a dedicated I/O interface (no secure channel).

SECURITY_CDCVM_V2B_SC - Static variable in interface org.globalplatform.broker.CDCVMBrokerListener
Transmission of CDCVM verification result from verifier to broker uses a secure channel.
SECURITY_CDCVM_V2B_UNKNOWN - Static variable in interface org.globalplatform.broker.CDCVMBrokerListener
Transmission of CDCVM verification result from verifier to broker uses unknown security mechanisms (possibly none).
SECURITY_CDCVM_V2B_XIO_NO_SC - Static variable in interface org.globalplatform.broker.CDCVMBrokerListener
Transmission of CDCVM verification result from verifier to broker uses a dedicated I/O interface (no secure channel).
SERVICE_BROKER_CDCVM - Static variable in interface org.globalplatform.broker.CDCVMBrokerCallbackRequest
Constant used to register and retrieve the Global Service implementing this interface (FAMILY_BROKER_SERVICE<<8|0x01).

U

updateBrokerRequest(byte[], short, short) - Method in interface org.globalplatform.broker.BrokerRequestHandler
Accumulates the data of a Broker Request.

V

VERIFY_FAILED - Static variable in interface org.globalplatform.broker.CDCVMBrokerRequestHandler
